mapper.select:
SELECT A.* , (SELECT NMCODE_NM FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '202' AND NMCODE_CD = A.HQ_GBN) AS HQ_GBN_NM FROM (SELECT M.HQ_GBN , M.STORE_CD , (SELECT STORE_NM FROM TB_MS_STORE WHERE STORE_CD = M.STORE_CD) AS STORE_NM , M.TOT_DATE , M.SEQ_NO , M.PROC_FG_NM , M.DTL_CNT , M.TITLE , M.REASON_CD , M.REASON_NM
FROM ( SELECT '1' AS HQ_GBN , TSSAI.STORE_CD , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TSSAI.ACINS_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TOT_DATE , TSSAI.SEQ_NO , DECODE(TSSAI.PROC_FG,'0','등록','확정') AS PROC_FG_NM , TSSAI.DTL_CNT , TSSAI.ACINS_TITLE AS TITLE , TSSAI.REASON_CD , (SELECT NMCODE_NM FROM TB_MS_STORE_NMCODE thm WHERE thm.STORE_CD = TSSAI.STORE_CD AND NMCODE_GRP_CD = '134' AND thm.NMCODE_CD = TSSAI.REASON_CD) AS REASON_NM FROM TB_ST_STORE_ACTUAL_INSPECTION TSSAI WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM TB_MS_STORE Z WHERE Z.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND Z.STORE_CD = TSSAI.STORE_CD)
AND TSSAI.ACINS_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} /* 조회일자 */
AND TSSAI.PROC_FG = #{procFg} /* (0:등록, 1:확정) */
AND TSSAI.STORE_CD IN
#{item}
UNION ALL SELECT '2' AS HQ_GBN , TSSA.STORE_CD , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TSSA.ADJ_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TOT_DATE , TSSA.SEQ_NO , DECODE(TSSA.PROC_FG,'0','등록','확정') AS PROC_FG_NM , TSSA.DTL_CNT , TSSA.ADJ_TITLE AS TITLE , TSSA.REASON_CD , (SELECT NMCODE_NM FROM TB_MS_STORE_NMCODE thm WHERE thm.STORE_CD = TSSA.STORE_CD AND NMCODE_GRP_CD = '135' AND thm.NMCODE_CD = TSSA.REASON_CD) AS REASON_NM FROM TB_ST_STORE_ADJUST TSSA WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM TB_MS_STORE Z WHERE Z.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND Z.STORE_CD = TSSA.STORE_CD)
AND TSSA.ADJ_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} /* 조회일자 */
AND TSSA.PROC_FG = #{procFg} /* (0:등록, 1:확정) */
AND TSSA.STORE_CD IN
#{item}
UNION ALL SELECT '3' AS HQ_GBN , TSSD.STORE_CD , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TSSD.DISUSE_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TOT_DATE , TSSD.SEQ_NO , DECODE(TSSD.PROC_FG,'0','등록','확정') AS PROC_FG_NM , TSSD.DTL_CNT , TSSD.DISUSE_TITLE AS TITLE , TSSD.REASON_CD , (SELECT NMCODE_NM FROM TB_MS_STORE_NMCODE thm WHERE thm.STORE_CD = TSSD.STORE_CD AND NMCODE_GRP_CD = '136' AND thm.NMCODE_CD = TSSD.REASON_CD) AS REASON_NM FROM TB_ST_STORE_DISUSE TSSD WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM TB_MS_STORE Z WHERE Z.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND Z.STORE_CD = TSSD.STORE_CD)
AND TSSD.DISUSE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} /* 조회일자 */
AND TSSD.PROC_FG = #{procFg} /* (0:등록, 1:확정) */
AND TSSD.STORE_CD IN
#{item}
) M WHERE 1 = 1
AND M.HQ_GBN = #{statusFg} /* (1:실사, 2:조정, 3:폐기) */
AND M.REASON_CD = #{reason}
ORDER BY M.STORE_CD, M.HQ_GBN ) A
